sentences.french: Réveille-toi, mon chéri, il est l’heure de se lever!

translation.en: Wake up, my darling, it's time to get up!

sentences.french: Maman... encore cinq minutes...

translation.en: Mom... five more minutes...

sentences.french: Non, non! Tu vas être en retard. Allez, debout!

translation.en: No, no! You’re going to be late. Come on, get up!
translation.uk: Ні, ні! Ти запізнишся. Давай, вставай!

sentences.french: D'accord... je me lève...

translation.en: Okay... I'm getting up...

sentences.french: N'oublie pas de te laver le visage et de te brosser les dents!

translation.en: Don't forget to wash your face and brush your teeth!
translation.uk: Не забудь вмитися і почистити зуби!

sentences.french: Viens à table! Le petit déjeuner est prêt.

translation.en: Come to the table! Breakfast is ready.

sentences.french: Qu’est-ce qu’on mange?

translation.en: What are we eating?

sentences.french: Du pain avec du beurre et de la confiture, et un verre de lait.

translation.en: Bread with butter and jam, and a glass of milk.
translation.uk: Хліб з маслом і варенням, і склянка молока.

sentences.french: Miam! J’adore la confiture.

translation.en: Yum! I love jam.

sentences.french: Prêt pour l’école? Mets tes chaussures et prends ton cartable.

translation.en: Ready for school? Put on your shoes and take your schoolbag.
translation.uk: Готовий до школи? Взувайся і бери рюкзак.

sentences.french: Oui, papa!

translation.en: Yes, Dad!

sentences.french: À ce soir, maman!

translation.en: See you this evening, Mom!

sentences.french: Bonne journée, mon chéri!

translation.en: Have a great day, my dear!

sentences.french: As-tu tout pris? Ton cartable, ton cahier?

translation.en: Did you take everything? Your schoolbag, your notebook?

sentences.french: Oui, tout est là!

translation.en: Yes, everything is here!

sentences.french: Alors, allons-y. L’école nous attend!

translation.en: Then let's go. School is waiting for us!
translation.uk: Тоді ходімо. Школа чекає на нас!

sentences.french: Papa, pourquoi il y a tant de voitures ce matin?

translation.en: Dad, why are there so many cars this morning?
translation.uk: Тату, чому сьогодні так багато машин?

sentences.french: C’est l’heure de pointe. Tout le monde va au travail ou à l’école.

translation.en: It’s rush hour. Everyone is going to work or school.
translation.uk: Це година пік. Усі їдуть на роботу або до школи.

sentences.french: Ah d’accord… On arrive bientôt?

translation.en: Oh, okay… Are we arriving soon?

sentences.french: Oui, regarde, l’école est juste là.

translation.en: Yes, look, the school is right there.

sentences.french: Merci de m’avoir emmené, papa!

translation.en: Thanks for taking me, Dad!

sentences.french: De rien, passe une bonne journée! À ce soir!

translation.en: You're welcome, have a great day! See you this evening!
translation.uk: Будь ласка, гарного дня! До вечора!
